## Arc2.(constructor)

Creates an Arc object from the three given points : start, middle and end.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(
    startPoint: Vector2, 
    midPoint: Vector2, 
    endPoint: Vector2);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  startPoint | <code>Vector2</code> | Defines the start point of the arc |
|  midPoint | <code>Vector2</code> | Defines the midlle point of the arc |
|  endPoint | <code>Vector2</code> | Defines the end point of the arc |
